      • move_to

        public InteractiveState move_to(FloatPoint p_to_location)

        move_to.

        Moves the items of the group to p_to_location. Return this.return_state, if an error eccured while moving, so that an undo may be necessary.
        Specified by:
        move_to in class DragState
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a InteractiveState object.
